description: Comprehensive test dataset with problematic tab examples that currently get miscategorized

testCases.description: Tabs that incorrectly get assigned to Research instead of specific categories

tabs.title: Wikipedia - JavaScript
tabs.reason: Wikipedia should not be Research - it's general reference

tabs.title: MDN Web Docs - Array methods
tabs.reason: Technical documentation should be Development, not Research

tabs.title: React Documentation - Hooks
tabs.reason: Framework docs are Development resources

tabs.title: Stack Overflow - How to center a div
tabs.reason: Programming Q&A is Development, not Research

tabs.title: Medium - Building a REST API
tabs.reason: Technical tutorials on Medium are Development

tabs.title: YouTube - JavaScript Tutorial
tabs.reason: YouTube content is Entertainment, even educational videos

testCases.description: Entertainment sites incorrectly categorized as News

tabs.title: IMDb - Top 250 Movies
tabs.reason: IMDb is always Entertainment, never News

tabs.title: Rotten Tomatoes - Movie Reviews
tabs.reason: Movie review sites are Entertainment

tabs.title: Metacritic - Game Reviews
tabs.reason: Entertainment review aggregators are Entertainment

tabs.title: Variety - Hollywood News
tabs.reason: Entertainment industry news is still Entertainment

testCases.description: Tabs that get assigned generic categories like Tools, Utilities, Misc

tabs.title: Random Blog - Tech Tips
tabs.reason: Unknown domains should be Uncategorized, not generic Tools

tabs.title: Personal Website - Portfolio
tabs.reason: Personal sites without clear category should be Uncategorized

tabs.title: Company Internal Tool
tabs.reason: Unknown internal tools should be Uncategorized, not Misc

testCases.description: Tabs where domain should override AI categorization

tabs.title: GitHub - News and Updates
tabs.reason: GitHub domain authority should override title suggesting News

tabs.title: Gmail - Newsletter Signup
tabs.reason: Gmail domain authority should override newsletter content

tabs.title: Netflix - Documentary About Science
tabs.reason: Netflix domain should override documentary subject matter

tabs.title: Amazon - Research Papers Book
tabs.reason: Amazon domain indicates Shopping, regardless of product type

testCases.description: Examples for testing confidence scoring based on domain/title match strength

tabs.title: GitHub - microsoft/vscode
tabs.reason: Exact domain match should have very high confidence

tabs.title: docs.github.com - API Reference
tabs.reason: Subdomain match should have high confidence

tabs.title: Random Site - GitHub Tutorial
tabs.reason: Title pattern match should have medium confidence

tabs.title: Unknown Site - Random Content
tabs.reason: No domain or title signals should have low confidence

testCases.description: Edge cases and boundary conditions for validation

tabs.reason: Empty title should not cause errors

tabs.title: Valid Title
tabs.reason: Empty URL/domain should not cause errors

tabs.title: Research Paper: Machine Learning
tabs.reason: Genuine academic content should be allowed as Research

tabs.title: How to Research Markets
tabs.reason: Non-academic research content should not use Research category

tabs.title: Gmail
tabs.reason: Chrome extension URLs should be handled gracefully
